roles.title: Software Engineering Co-op
roles.teamDescription: Client Engineering - Industry Engineering Lab (Telecommunications Media Entertainment Market ) @ IBM Global Solutions Center in Coppell, TX.
roles.highLevelDescription: Demonstrate the value of IBM by engineering solutions in areas such as Machine Learning, Networking, Distributed Computing and Hybrid Cloud
description: Work closely with team members and clients to generate high quality demo ready technical sales assets for the progression or close of solution sales opportunities
Develop full stack applications, utilizing modern web-development tools & frameworks
Work extensively with IBM Machine Learning Software to create demo ready solutions
Create, deploy and manage containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.highLevelDescription: Engineer tools for monitoring cryptocurrency networks in real-time
description: Sole developer of a Full Stack Web App 'Multi Blockchain Address Watching/Aggregating/Alerting'
Show complete proficiency in Data fetching(Public Blockchain Data), Data Parsing(JSON, SQL), Data Manipulating, Data Preparation/Representation using Python (Pandas, Excel)
Show proficiency in creating/working with databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Object Relational Mapping)
Design and iteratively develop full stack private in-house websites, utilizing modern web-development tools & frameworks i.e React.js, TypeScript, SCSS, Next.JS, Node.js
Create, deploy and manage containerized applications using Docker and Docker-Compose
Demonstrate presentation and public speaking skills with Code Reviews, Weekly StandUps, Demos

roles.title: Software Engineering Intern
roles.teamDescription: Provide custom-built tools monitor cryptocurrency networks in real-time to provide a high-level, detailed analysis of all blockchain transactions.
roles.highLevelDescription: Demonstrate excellence in knowledge gain of Blockchain Technologies and provide basic data engineering services
description: Perform Data Parsing, Cleaning, Preparation using Python
Fork Bitcoin Source Code & Create Changes for in-house software(Bitcoin Timestamp Supernode)
Compile 2 Bitcoin Nodes from source in testnet using Ubuntu Virtual Machines for research purposes
Present 10+ use cases of Bitcoin-CLI for investigation, development, data fetching
Explain Complex Concepts in simple terms i.e Blockchain Technology, Cryptocurrency, Proof-of-work Algorithm, Double-Spending Problem
Demonstrate excellent soft-skills via code review, team development, presentations

roles.title: Software Engineer Apprentice
roles.teamDescription: Selection of exemplary highschool students to gain work-based experience of Dell Technologies
roles.highLevelDescription: Assist internal technical specialist team to solve tickets regarding Dell hardware issues
description: Shadowing 5+ Software Engineers(Agile Development)
Mentored by a Senior Technician
Q&A panel with Dell executives
Resume Critique by Human Resources
